import numpy as np # linear algebra

source.13e86aea:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import plotly.express as px
import plotly.graph_objects as go
from plotly.subplots import make_subplots
source.d72446ec:
games = sorted(set(steam['Game_Name'].unique()))

fig=go.Figure()

game_plot_names = []
buttons=[]

default_game = "Counter Strike: Global Offensive"

for game_name in games:
    game = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == game_name]
   
    
    
    
    fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=game["Month_Year"], y=game["Avg_players"], line={}, visible=(game_name==default_game)))
  
    game_plot_names.extend([game_name])
    
for game_name in games:
    buttons.append(dict(method='update',
                        label=game_name,
                        args = [{'visible': [game_name==r for r in game_plot_names]}]))

# Add dropdown menus to the figure
fig.update_layout(showlegend=False, updatemenus=[{"buttons": buttons, "direction": "down", "active": games.index(default_game), "showactive": True, "x": 0.5, "y": 1.30}])
fig.update_yaxes(title_text='Average players')
fig.show()

gta = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Grand Theft Auto V']
csgo = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Counter Strike: Global Offensive']
fgu = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout']
pubg = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'PUBG: Battlegrounds']
rdr = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Red Dead Redemption II']
mhw = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Monster Hunter: World']
de = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'DOOM Eternal']
dot = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'DOTA 2']
rss = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == "Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege"]
cpk = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Cyberpunk 2077']
amu = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Among Us']
des = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Destiny 2']

pha = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Phasmophobia']
bor = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Borderlands 3']
crk = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Crusader Kings III']
ark = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'ARK: Survial Evolved']
sot = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Sea of Thieves']
bga = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == "Baldur's Gate 3"]
wrf = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Warframe']
esc = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'The Elder Scrolls Online']
smc = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == "Sid Meier's Civilization VI"]

dbd = steam[steam['Game_Name'] == 'Dead by Daylight']
source.23a29bc7:
fig = go.Figure()

fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=gta['Month_Year'],y=gta['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='GTA'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=csgo['Month_Year'],y=csgo['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='CS:GO'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=fgu['Month_Year'],y=fgu['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='Fall Guys'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=pubg['Month_Year'],y=pubg['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='PUBG'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=rdr['Month_Year'],y=rdr['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='Red Dead Redemption'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=mhw['Month_Year'],y=mhw['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='Monster Hunter'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=de['Month_Year'],y=de['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='DOOM Eternal'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=dot['Month_Year'],y=dot['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='DOTA 2'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=rss['Month_Year'],y=rss['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='Rainbow Seige'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=cpk['Month_Year'],y=cpk['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='Cyberpunk 2077'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=amu['Month_Year'],y=amu['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='Among Us'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=des['Month_Year'],y=des['Gain'], mode='lines+markers', name='Destiny 2'))

fig.update_layout(title='Gain of players for platinum titles')
fig.add_annotation(x='March 2020',y=0, text='Lockdown for COVID-19', showarrow=True, arrowhead=5, ax=10, ay=-90)
fig.show()

source.33604b42:
gta_t = twitch[twitch['Game'] == 'Grand Theft Auto V']
csgo_t = twitch[twitch['Game'] == 'Counter-Strike: Global Offensive']
lol_t = twitch[twitch['Game'] == 'League of Legends']
de_t = twitch[twitch['Game'] == 'DOOM Eternal']
rss_t = twitch[twitch['Game'] == "Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege"]
cpk_t = twitch[twitch['Game'] == 'Cyberpunk 2077']
source.dd5ff56f:
fig = make_subplots(rows=3,cols=2, subplot_titles=('GTA V','CS:GO', 'League of Legends', 'DOOM Eternal','Rainbow Six Siege','Cyberpunk 2077'))

fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=gta_t['Year'],y=gta_t['Avg_viewers'], marker_color='indianred',showlegend=False),row=1,col=1)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=csgo_t['Year'],y=csgo_t['Avg_viewers'], marker_color='lightsalmon',showlegend=False),row=1,col=2)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=lol_t['Year'],y=lol_t['Avg_viewers'], marker_color='goldenrod',showlegend=False),row=2,col=1)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=de_t['Year'],y=de_t['Avg_viewers'], marker_color='magenta',showlegend=False),row=2,col=2)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=rss_t['Year'],y=rss_t['Avg_viewers'], marker_color='green',showlegend=False),row=3,col=1)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=cpk_t['Year'],y=cpk_t['Avg_viewers'], marker_color='yellow',showlegend=False),row=3,col=2)
fig.update_layout(barmode='group', height=500, title='Average viewers on twitch')
fig.show()
source.373d5dd6:
fig = make_subplots(rows=3,cols=2, subplot_titles=('GTA V','CS:GO', 'League of Legends', 'DOOM Eternal','Rainbow Six Siege','Cyberpunk 2077'))

fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=gta_t['Year'],y=gta_t['Streamers'], marker_color='indianred',showlegend=False),row=1,col=1)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=csgo_t['Year'],y=csgo_t['Streamers'], marker_color='lightsalmon',showlegend=False),row=1,col=2)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=lol_t['Year'],y=lol_t['Streamers'], marker_color='goldenrod',showlegend=False),row=2,col=1)

fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=rss_t['Year'],y=rss_t['Streamers'], marker_color='green',showlegend=False),row=3,col=1)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=cpk_t['Year'],y=cpk_t['Streamers'], marker_color='yellow',showlegend=False),row=3,col=2)
fig.update_layout(barmode='group', height=500, title='Streamers on twitch')
fig.show()
source.d39a199b:
fig = make_subplots(rows=3,cols=2, subplot_titles=('GTA V','CS:GO', 'League of Legends', 'DOOM Eternal','Rainbow Six Siege','Cyberpunk 2077'))

fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=gta_t['Year'],y=gta_t['Avg_channels'], marker_color='indianred',showlegend=False),row=1,col=1)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=csgo_t['Year'],y=csgo_t['Avg_channels'], marker_color='lightsalmon',showlegend=False),row=1,col=2)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=lol_t['Year'],y=lol_t['Avg_channels'], marker_color='goldenrod',showlegend=False),row=2,col=1)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=de_t['Year'],y=de_t['Avg_channels'], marker_color='magenta',showlegend=False),row=2,col=2)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=rss_t['Year'],y=rss_t['Avg_channels'], marker_color='green',showlegend=False),row=3,col=1)
fig.add_trace(go.Bar(x=cpk_t['Year'],y=cpk_t['Avg_channels'], marker_color='yellow',showlegend=False),row=3,col=2)
fig.update_layout(barmode='group', height=500, title='Average number of channels per month streaming on twitch')
fig.show()
